exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0"  source="loadingBarBg_png" scale9Grid="32,16,15,5"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="loadingBar_png" y="3" x="3" width="392" height="30" scale9Grid="26,12,296,7"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="18" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xffffff"
	         horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingRoomPBSkin" width="426" height="31" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image scale9Grid="2,2,2,2" width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0"  source="loadingRoomBarBg_png"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="6,4,4,4" y="-5" x="0"  source="loadingRoomBar_png" width="427"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="18" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PlayerLvProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="5" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image scale9Grid="2,2,2,2" width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0" source="playerLvBarBg_png" />
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="playerLvBarBar_png" scale9Grid="2,2,2,2" />
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="12" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
	         horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DiceGameSkin" width="1500" height="760" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="156683091a5"/>
	<e:Image source="diceGameBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Group width="805" height="477" x="224" y="74">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="diceGameSton_png" x="155" y="56"/>
	<e:Image source="diceGamePlant_png" x="235" y="73"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DicePanelSkin" width="953" height="549" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="1567c8cc8e3" />
	<e:Image source="DiceCharBg_png" x="11" y="117" />
	<e:RadioButton label="" x="9" y="108" id="diceDoingBtn">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceDoingBtn1_png" source.down="diceDoingBtn2_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:RadioButton>
	<e:RadioButton label="" x="70" y="109" id="diceCompleteBtn">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceCompleteBtn1_png" source.down="diceCompleteBtn2_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:RadioButton>
	<e:Image source="diceBg_png" x="132" y="48" />
	<e:Image source="diceImage1_png" x="0" y="20" touchEnabled="flase" />
	<e:Image source="diceImage2_png" x="104" y="335" touchEnabled="flase" />
	<e:Image source="diceImage3_png" x="664" y="0" touchEnabled="flase" />
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" x="899" y="20">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceCloseBtn1_png" source.down="diceCloseBtn2_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label text="version 0.0.0.1" x="29" y="529" size="12" />
	<e:Label text="" x="327" y="62" width="386" height="73" size="14" />
	<e:Image source="diceTimePanel_png" x="0" y="0" />
	<e:Button id="singeBtn" label="" x="858" y="169">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceSingeBtn_png" source.down="diceSingeBtn_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="getBtn" label="" x="848" y="251">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceGetBtn_png" source.down="diceGetBtn_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="infoBtn" label="" x="851" y="333">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceInfoBtn_png" source.down="diceInfoBtn_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Scroller id="contentScroller" width="745" height="354" x="146" y="156" viewport="{contentGroup}" bounces="false">
		<e:Group id="contentGroup" />
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LabbySkin" width="960" height="570" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="156273924e2" />
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="lobbyBg_png" />
	<e:Image id="jpBtn" x="154" y="-12" source="lobbyJpBg_png" />
	<e:Image x="716" y="-12" source="lobbyRankBg_png" />
	<e:Button id="nBtn" x="636" y="297">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pageBtn1_png" source.down="pageBtn3_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="pBtn" x="83" y="379" rotation="180">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="pageBtn1_png" source.down="pageBtn3_png" />
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="lobbyTeammateBg_png" x="-5" y="-5" />
	<e:Button id="diceBtn" label="" x="639" y="100">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="diceBtn1_png" source.down="diceBtn2_png" />
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	
	<e:Scroller id="listScroller" width="512" height="235" x="110" y="212">
		<e:List id="roomList" x="96" y="219" />
	</e:Scroller>
	
	<e:ViewStack width="315" height="72" x="412" y="3" id="viewStack" selectedIndex="0">
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xf50607" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xffc900" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xebfe50" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x00ff1b" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x00ffa4" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x0051ff" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xff0099" />
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="315" height="100%" name="视图">
			<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xf7f6f6" />
		</e:Group>
	</e:ViewStack>
	<e:TabBar id="tabBar" width="315" height="71" x="412" y="4" dataProvider="{viewStack}">
		<e:itemRendererSkinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down" height="10">
				<e:Rect width="10" height="10" x="0" y="0" fillColor.up="0xffffff" fillColor.down="0xaaaaaa" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:itemRendererSkinName>
	</e:TabBar>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoadRoomSkin" width="960" height="570" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="loadingRoomBg_png" x="0" y="0" width="960" height="570"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="bar" x="274" y="428" width="456" skinName="LoadingRoomPBSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadSkin" width="960" height="560" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="loadingBg_png" />
	<e:Label id="tempText" height="120" width="350" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" x="0" y="440" />
	<e:Label id="versionText" text="V a_1_0_15122_1424" x="480" y="518" width="244" size="14"  textColor="0x000000" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="tipText" x="0" y="9" width="100%" textAlign="center" height="50" size="12" />
	<!--<e:ProgressBar id="bar" x="281" y="313" skinName="LoadingProgressBarSkin" width="399" height="36"/>-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TestSkin" width="200" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.4"/>
	<e:Button id="curBtn" label="换套路径" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="50"/>
	<e:Button id="changeMapBtn" label="换地图" x="0" height="50" y="50"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="关闭显示" x="0" height="50" width="100" y="100"/>
	<e:Label id="numText" text="鱼当前数量：0" x="2" width="201" size="20" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label id="showNumText" text="当前显示数量：0" x="1" width="201" size="20" bottom="20"/>
	<e:Button label="3" x="100" y="100"/>
	<e:Button label="1" x="100"/>
	<e:Button label="2" x="100" y="50"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AlertSkin" width="464" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="alertBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Button id="returnBtn" label="" x="256" y="103">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="alertCanleBtn1_png" source.down="alertCanleBtn2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="okBtn" label="" x="105" y="103">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="alertOkBtn1_png" source.down="alertOkBtn2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="contentText" text="你好世界" x="26" y="27" width="423" height="74" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="28"/>
	<e:Label text="提示" x="35" y="5" size="14" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HelpPanelSkin" width="557" height="375" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image source="helpBg_png" x="0" y="0" />
    <e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" x="518" y="17" width="16" height="16">
        <e:skinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="xbtn1_png" source.down="xbtn2_png" />
                <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
            </e:Skin>
        </e:skinName>
    </e:Button>
    <e:TabBar dataProvider="{viewStack}" width="517" height="28" x="21" y="42">
        <e:itemRendererSkinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down" height="26">
                <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="helpMBtn1_png" source.down="helpMBtn2_png" />
                <e:Label text="{data}" textColor.down="0xFFFFFF" textColor.up="0x1111aa" horizontalCenter="0"
                         verticalCenter="0" size="12" />
            </e:Skin>
        </e:itemRendererSkinName>
    </e:TabBar>
    <e:ViewStack id="viewStack" width="517" height="287" x="21" y="70" selectedIndex="0">
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="操作说明">
            <e:Image source="page1_png" x="48" y="15" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="大炮说明">
            <e:Image source="page2_png" x="53" y="5" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="鱼的价值" />
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="游戏说明">
            <e:Image source="page4_png" x="43" y="15" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="炸弹鱼">
            <e:Image source="page5_png" x="43" y="3" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="锁定说明">
            <e:Image source="page6_png" x="69" y="18" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" name="任务">
            <e:Image source="page7_png" x="49" y="28" />
        </e:Group>
    </e:ViewStack>
    <e:ToggleSwitch label="游戏开始时显示帮助" x="31" y="339">
        <e:skinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image width="15" height="14" source="SettingSelectBox1_png" source.down="SettingSelectBox2_png" />
                <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="10" verticalCenter="0" size="14" textColor="0xF3FF00" />
            </e:Skin>
        </e:skinName>
    </e:ToggleSwitch>
